FuncDef:
The display optical-module extend information slot command displays current voltage/power values and alarm thresholds of all optical modules on a specified subcard or slot.
The display optical-module base information slot command displays basic information about the vendor, bandwidth, type, wavelength, and optical power of all optical modules on a specified subcard or slot.
The display optical-module extend information interface command displays current voltage/power values and alarm thresholds of all optical modules on a specified interface.
The display optical-module base information interface command displays basic information about the vendor, bandwidth, type, wavelength, and optical power of all optical modules on a specified interface.
The display optical-module extend information controller command displays current voltage/power values and alarm thresholds of all optical modules on a specified interface.
The display optical-module base information controller command displays basic information about the vendor, bandwidth, type, wavelength, and optical power of all optical modules on a specified interface.
CLIs: display optical-module base information slot <slot-id> [ card <card-id> ]
display optical-module extend information slot <slot-id> [ card <card-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays a card ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 4294967295.

Displays basic information about the vendor, bandwidth, type, wavelength, and optical power of all optical modules.
-

Displays current voltage/power values and alarm thresholds of optical module.
-

Displays a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Displays current voltage/power values and alarm thresholds of all optical modules.
-

Examples: [~HUAWEI] display optical-module base information interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/1
[~HUAWEI] display optical-module extend information interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/1
Transceiver Digital Diagnostic Monitoring (DDM), Internally Calibrated
Card*-Port1  +               Value HighAlarm HighWarn LowWarn LowAlarm Status
PLD or Flash Initialization Fault : normal
PLD or Flash Initialization Fault Enable : enable
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To perform one-click query about the fixed, version information and dynamic information of all optical modules, run the preceding commands. These commands are specially intended for querying about dynamic information (such as the threshold and real-time value for the temperature, voltage, and bias current) of the optical modules when they are faulty.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
